mapper.select: SELECT a.board_id, a.board_title, a.board_content, a.created_at, a.board_image, a.likes_count, a.comments_count, b.user_id, b.email, b.nickname, b.bio, b.profile_image FROM board a left join users b on a.created_by = b.email order by created_at desc limit #{page}, 12
SELECT * FROM board a left join image_urls b on a.board_id = b.board_id where created_by = #{created_by} order by created_at desc

SELECT a.board_id, a.board_title, a.board_content, a.created_at, a.board_image, a.likes_count, a.comments_count, b.user_id, b.email, b.nickname, b.bio, b.profile_image FROM board a left join users b on a.created_by = b.email where a.board_id = #{board_id} order by created_at desc
